participant_1.background:
I once lost my favorite necklace, which was a gift from my grandmother.
I enjoy cooking for my beloved cat and dog.
My favorite book is a collection of spooky Halloween stories.
i am a drummer in an indie band.
i love the beach.

participant_2.background:
My sister-in-law said I was a lazy bum because I never had to work, but she doesn't know that I spend my days running my family business.
The weather is not usually a factor when I am outside looking for wildlife.
I'm just trying to live my life and be myself, and I enjoy country music, tattoos, and iced tea.
I'm single and enjoy my freedom to drive around with the wind in my hair.
i love my impala.

content.text: Hey! Not much, just hanging out. What about you?
Same here. I'm just getting ready to go to the beach with my friends.
Oh that sounds fun! I love the beach. I'm actually a wildlife photographer, so I spend a lot of time outside looking for animals.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to be a photographer.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be hard work.
I bet. But I'm sure it's worth it when you get to see all the amazing animals.
Definitely! I've seen some really cool things.
What's the coolest animal you've ever seen?
I once saw a bald eagle flying overhead. It was amazing!
That's awesome! I've never seen a bald eagle in person.
You should come to the beach with me sometime. I'll show you some cool animals.
Great! We'll have to make plans sometime.
